name: BatteryCasingMetadata
description: A description of lithium ion battery casing metadata

properties.name: nominal_length
properties.description: Length of the housing. For cylindrical/coin housing, the diameter

properties.name: nominal_width
properties.description: Width of the housing. For cylindrical/coin housing, the diameter

properties.name: nominal_height
properties.description: Height of the housing. For cylindrical/coin housing, the diameter

properties.name: form_factor
properties.description: Form factor of the housing. Valid entries are: pouch, coin, prismatic, cylindrical, other, or unknown
